QuestData.Title: Slap and Cap
QuestData.Description: Oh for... not again! If you heard the deputy yelling out there, that means we've got a fullblown oil leak on our hands! It's those filthy worgen again!$B$BListen, it's going to be total chaos out there. Sleep-deprived goblins running around screaming and not knowing what to do. I need you to snap the workers back to their senses.$B$BA good, swift backhand across the face should do it! Once they shake themselves off, they'll get to work capping those gushers!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slap 7 Panicked Workers to make them cap the oil gushers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you in a panic too? Keep standing around here confused and I'll give you my own cure for that.
QuestData.RewardText: It's not working! We're going to have to shut it off at the source.$B$BGo talk to the Deputy outside, he'll walk you through it!
